meanings.definition: A diagram that represents a process or algorithm.
meanings.sent1: I drew a flowchart to show how to make a sandwich.
meanings.sent2: The flowchart helped me understand the steps for solving the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The flowchart for making a cake was so detailed, it made me hungry!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a flowchart, organizing thoughts into clear steps.
meanings.sent5: The flowchart for assembling the toy was like a map guiding me to the finish line.

meanings.definition: To create a flowchart for a project.
meanings.sent1: She will flowchart the plan for the school play.
meanings.sent2: I need to flowchart the steps for organizing the event.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could flowchart his way out of any problem.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like a river as she flowcharted the design.
meanings.sent5: Flowcharting the schedule made it easier to see the deadlines at a glance.

meanings.definition: The flowchart clearly outlined the steps to follow.
meanings.sent1: The teacher used a flowchart to explain the science experiment.
meanings.sent2: I referred to the flowchart to understand the sequence of events.
meanings.sent3: The flowchart for the treasure hunt was like a secret map.
meanings.sent4: His plan was as intricate as a flowchart, leaving no room for error.
meanings.sent5: The flowchart for the dance routine made it easy to remember the steps.
